attributes.action: Scrap compulsory parish council tax in HUYTON L36 (K M B C)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kirby residents do not pay this outdated method of obtaining local revenue,so why should people in Huyton?
Both areas are KMBC controlled.Kirby has more ammenities and does not pay it.European grant money is the policy now for sink areas.Parish Council is not needed,we get nothing from it,it should be declared obsolete.Thank you.
